2.「しかし 悪い予感が 的中したのでアール……。| こんなにも早く ヤツが現れると: But my bad premonition was right on the|money. I didn't expect him to show up so|soon.

3.「……ところで <pc>は| こんな所に 何をしにきたのでアールか？: ... By the way, what is <pc>|doing here?

4.「……ふむ。ホッツィ親方が| この辺りで 魔物に襲われたから| その調査に来たの: ... Master Hotsey was attacked by a demon|around here, so we came here to investigate.

5.「……ホッツィ親方を襲ったのは| あの魔物に まちがいないだろうね。| ボクらも: ... I'm sure it was that monster that|attacked Master Hotsey. We came here after|him.

6.「あの魔物の名は 魔獣ビュブロス……。| クチから発する光線で 人の魂を| 吸い:
The demon is a hexenbiest named Byblos. It's|a horrifying creature that lives by sucking|the souls of men with the rays of light it|
|emits from its mouth.

7.「あそこで ぬけがらのように倒れてる旅人は| その光線を くらっちゃったんだね…: The traveler lying there like a piece of|junk must have been exposed to that beam of|light. Poor guy.

8.「……ビュブロスは モガリム街道に向かった。| このまま 放っておけば ヤツは|: ... Byblos is on his way to the Moghalim|road. If we don't stop him, he'll attack the|town of Agrani in search of more souls.

9.「……だが そうはさせん。| ヤツは わしと この杖が なんとかする。| ホッツ: ... But that's not... He's not the one that|I and my wand... I'll tell Hotsey not to|worry.

11.「ルナナ！ お前みたいな はねっ返りが| 今さら アグラニに 何しにきやがった！: Lunana! What the hell is a bouncing bitch|like you doing in Agrani after all this|time?

12.「なんですって……！？| 誰のおかげで この町が再興したと思ってんの？| 全部: What the...! Who do you think is responsible|for the revival of this town? I'm the one|who made all this happen!

14.「今日は それに対する 礼状を書いてもらうわ。| アグラニを救った英雄！ とでも:
Today, I'd like to write you a thank-you|note for that. The hero who saved Agrani!|I'm sure the world will be able to see me if|
|I have a title like that, right?

15.「か～っ！ なに言ってやがる！| お前の くだらん野望に 振りまわされて| オレ: Ka~! What the hell are you talking about?|We've been through hell because of your|stupid ambitions!

16.「お前の亡くなった親父さん…… ホルタ神父は| 本当に アグラニに尽くした 人格: Your late father... Father Horta was a true|man of character who served Agrani well. And|you, his daughter...

17.「うるさい！ 父さんは 関係ないでしょ！| あたしは この世界で のし上がるため: Shut up! You don't give a shit about my dad!|I will stop at nothing to get ahead in this|world! That's the way I am!

18.「ふん。お前には 何を言ってもムダだな。| オレは 礼状なんか書かねえぞ。| さ: Hmm. Whatever I say to you is moot. I'm not|writing you a thank-you note. Get the hell|out of here!

20.「おっと すまねえ！ 来てくれてたのか。| ご苦労だったな。さあ こっちに来て|: Oops, I'm sorry! Thank you for coming. Thank|you. Now, come on over here and tell me all|about it.

21.「……ほう。オレが襲われた場所に| 賢者ブロッゲンさまが 現れたってのか。| そ: ... The sage Brogen appeared where I was|attacked. That's strange. So?

22.「……なっ なんだと！？| オレを襲った魔物は 魂を吸い取る| 恐ろしい魔獣だっ: ... What the hell? The demon that attacked|me was a terrifying soul-sucking hexenbiest?

23.「しかも その魔獣ビュブロスって野郎は| アグラニを 襲うつもりでいただと……？: And this hexenbiest, Byblos, was planning to|attack Agrani...? This is crazy.

24.「ま…まあ あの賢者ブロッゲンさまが| なんとかしてくれるってえなら 安心か……: Well... Well, if that wise man Brogen will|take care of it, I'll be relieved. That's|the best thing that ever happened to me.

25.「よし！ ご苦労だったな。| オレを襲った魔物の件は よ～くわかったぜ。| さあ: All right! Good work. I know what happened|to the demon that attacked me. Here. I got|it.

26.「あなた どこかで会ったかしら？| まあ もし そうだとしても| あたしは いっ: Do I know you? Well, even if I did, I don't|remember a thing.

27.「でも インパクトに欠ける 顔に似合わず| ずいぶんと 面白いネタを持ってるのね: But for someone with a face that lacks|impact, you sure have a lot of interesting|stories. I'm interested in you.

28.「謎の魔獣に 賢者ブロッゲン……。| その話 今度 ゆっくり| 聞かせてもらうわ: A mysterious hexenbiest and a wise man named|Blodgen. I'll have to hear all about it|sometime.

29.「……で どうだったい？| オレを襲った魔物の正体 わかったか？: ... So, what did you think? Did you find out|what that thing was that attacked me?

31.「危ないところだったね。| あの光線に さわったら最後……。| あそこの旅人みた: That's a close call. If you touch that beam|of light. You'll end up like that traveler|over there.
